isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 18 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO-14618 AND RTLO-16618 SERIES - REASSEMBLE - LO RANGE GEAR AND OUTPUT SHAFT

svcproc.title: LO RANGE GEAR AND OUTPUT SHAFT

figure.caption: Figure 166. LO Range Gear and Output Shaft Exploded View

note.para: Make sure magnetic plugs are installed in the auxiliary housing

step1.para: IMPORTANT: Mark timing teeth on the LO Range gear ( Figure 167). A highly visible color of toolmaker's dye is recommended. Mark any two adjacent gear teeth on LO Range gear, front side. Then mark the two adjacent teeth which are directly opposite the first set marked. There should be the same number of teeth between the markings on each side of the gear.

figure.caption: Figure 167. Mark Timing Teeth on LO Range Gear

step1.para: Place splined washer on output shaft shoulder facing up as shown ( Figure 168).

figure.caption: Figure 168. Place Splined Washer on Output Shaft Shoulder

step1.para: Install the LO Range gear on the output shaft, clutching teeth engaged with the splines down to engage the washer splines ( Figure 169).

figure.caption: Figure 169. Install LO Range Gear on Output Shaft

step1.para: Install the LO Range gear rear washer on the output shaft and against the gear, with chamfer side facing up ( Figure 170).

figure.caption: Figure 170. Install LO Range Gear Rear Washer on Output Shaft

step1.para: Use a heat lamp or hot plate and oil to heat the output shaft rear bearing and install on output shaft. Seat the bearing securely on the shaft ( Figure 171). Bearing can also be installed using the appropriate driver.

figure.caption: Figure 171. Install Output Shaft Rear Bearing on Output Shaft

step1.para: Install the bearing inner spacer on the output shaft ( Figure 172).

figure.caption: Figure 172. Install Bearing Inner Spacer on Output Shaft

step1.para: Place the auxiliary housing on a flat bench and install the 2 bearing cups and spacer in the rear bearing bore, the cup with a lip seats next to the rear of the auxiliary case ( Figure 173).

figure.caption: Figure 173. Install Bearing Cups and Spacer in Rear Bearing Bore
